entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
